text: Goephanes luctuosus is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae which is native to Madagascar. It was described by Pascoe in 1862.Biolib.cz - Goephanes. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. A public domain drawing can be viewed in the Google books scan of the 1862 edition of the Journal of Entomology. ==References== Category:Goephanes Category:Beetles described in 1862 Category:Taxa named by Francis Polkinghorne Pascoe
title: Goephanes luctuosus
